feed.title: Ji, Yong Hyeon
feed.subtitle: I'm Ji Yong-Hyeon, a graduate student deeply interested in mathematics and cryptography. I focus on blending theoretical insights with practical solutions, designing and implementing cryptographic systems. My goal is to advance both the theory and engineering of cryptography through research and real-world projects. On my GitHub, you'll find contributions ranging from theoretical work to secure algorithms and systems. I'm always open to collaborations that challenge and expand our understanding of cryptography and mathematics.
